Manufacturer: Tyler Design & Tech
Size: 1
Grade: C

Constructed from the ground up to minimize your heat signature, Tyler Design’s SonicLite power plant has gained a following among pilots who appreciate a subtler approach.

Built to keep heat and signature levels low, the Drift quantum drive from RAMP Corporation helps to minimize emissions generated while spooling.

InstalledItem.Description:

Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Stealth

Ascension Astro is known for one thing — quality stealth components. Their Shimmer shield generator was built not only to help avoid detection, but also provide protection when needed most.

InstalledItem.Name: Hellion Scattergun
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Apocalypse Arms
Item Type: Ballistic Scattergun
Size: 2

Apocalypse Arms' Hellion is a size two scattergun that saturates targets with ballistic ammo in close quarters. The gun's smart ammo functionality allows it to switch between standard and specialty rounds.

InstalledItem.Name: MSD-111 Missile Rack
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Missile Rack
Manufacturer: Behring
Size: 1
Missiles: 1xS1

Behring’s MSD-111 "Marsden" is a complete ordnance storage and deployment system that can be mounted on any compatible size 1 hardpoint for the reliable and effective launch of one S1 missile.

InstalledItem.Name: Spark I Missile
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Firestorm Kinetics
Tracking Signal: Cross Section
Size: 1

Those that believe size doesn’t matter would do well to stay clear of the Firestorm Kinetics Spark. Using cross section targeting, this lightweight proximity missile packs a considerable punch.
